titles.title: Praise, My Soul, the King of Heaven

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise, my soul, the King of Heaven; to His feet thy tribute bring. Ransomed, healed, restored, forgiven, evermore His praises sing: Alleluia! Alleluia! Praise the everlasting King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Praise Him for His grace and favor to our fathers in distress. Praise Him still the same as ever, slow to chide, and swift to bless. Alleluia! Alleluia! Praise the everlasting King.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Fatherlike He tends and spares us; well our feeble frame He knows. In His hands He gently bears us, rescues us from all our foes. Alleluia! Alleluia! Praise the everlasting King.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Frail as summer's flow'r we flourish, blows the wind and it is gone; but while mortals rise and perish, God endures unchanging on. Alleluia! Alleluia! Praise the everlasting King.

verse.name: v5
